bibl.title: Preliminary Remarks on the Coptic Burials at Karanis.
bibl.note: Presents preliminary findings from the Karanis Cemetery Project (Interdepartmental Program of Archaeology, UCLA), based on research conducted in the 2008 through 2010 field seasons. - Site Description. - Project Description. - Construction of the Cemetery and its Coptic Grave Markers. - Survey of the Human Skeletal Remains. Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Anne E. Austin, Preliminary Remarks on the Coptic Burials at Karanis.

Presents preliminary findings from the Karanis Cemetery Project (Interdepartmental Program of Archaeology, UCLA), based on research conducted in the 2008 through 2010 field seasons. - Site Description. - Project Description. - Construction of the Cemetery and its Coptic Grave Markers. - Survey of the Human Skeletal Remains. Conclusions.
